content: I've updated the CRD scenarios for our connectathons: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201809_Coverage_Requirements_Discovery#Scenarios Feedback is welcome @Isaac Vetter @Lloyd McKenzie

Hey Andy -- overall, looks great!

Your "hello world" scenario includes requiring that the CDS Hooks client's FHIR server support the FHIR Coverage resource. Is that completely necessary for an MVP?

Isaac
I suppose we could leave that out. It looks like the request resource profiles have insurance as 0..*, so the MVP might not need them. Perhaps we can discuss this on the call today.
Can we include a non-PHI version of the scenarios (perhaps as a bonus)
